data.name: Movavi Video Converter Premium 19
data.detailed_description:
Stop wasting time converting your footage. With Movavi Video Converter Premium, you can do it in a flash – and with no loss of quality. Reduce the size of gameplay videos so they take up less space on your hard disk, and convert them to any of 180 supported formats. Ready the videos for uploading to YouTube, Vimeo, or other websites in no time.

Any format, any device

Video, audio, still images – this converter can change everything: MP4, AVI, MOV, FLV, MKV, WMV; MP3, WAV, WMA, FLAC, AAC; JPG, PNG, GIF, RAW formats, and more. Save your videos with the optimal settings for uploading to YouTube, or make them perfect for viewing on any device.

Supersonic conversion

With the support for many types of hardware acceleration, conversion is a breeze. For instance, with Intel, AMD, or NVIDIA technologies, you can convert files 3-5 times faster! Plus, the SuperSpeed mode lets you process your files even faster – enjoy lossless conversion in a split second.

Editing on the go

Enhance your files in the built-in editor:

  • Trim videos without converting them, instantly and without loss of quality
  • Overlay text or image watermarks
  • Change volume levels, remove background noise
  • Select audio stream, bitrate, and subtitle track for all files at once
  • Adjust colors, add video-enhancing filters
  • Crop, rotate, and stabilize footage

File conversion with Movavi Video Converter Premium takes next to no time and delivers the best possible quality results.

data.short_description: Reduce the size of gameplay and other videos for uploading online or storing on disk, trim your footage instantly without the need to convert it, and change the file format in the blink of an eye thanks to SuperSpeed mode.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® Vista/7/8/10 with up-to-date patches and service packs instal
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible processor, 1 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8, Intel® HD Graphics 2000, AMD Radeon™ R600 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Storage: 120 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Administrator permissions are required for installation

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X® 10.7 or higher
  • Processor: 64-bit Intel® processor
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280 × 768 screen resolution, 32-bit color
  • Storage: 890 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Administrator permissions are required for installation
